name: Superbot Arena
description:
Design your own Superbot and fight alongside or against others in this VR battle arena! Make your own motion gestures to activate a variety of abilities and effects to aid you in destroying your opponents. Includes AI bots and different game modes like "smash off" and endless play.

  • Outfit your custom Superbot with powers like Invisibility, Flight, Shields and Teleportation
  • Create your own power-activating gestures you can best remember and repeat in the heat of battle
  • All abilities available at the start: no unlocking required!
  • Want a Superbot that is just really strong with an amazing punch and no extra abilities? Go ahead!
  • Supports both single player, multiplayer co-op and player vs. player battles
  • Includes balancing modes to level the playing field between varying Superbots
  • "Smash Off" mode inspired by Nintendo's "Super Smash Bros: Melee"
  • Stats track wins, losses, max kills in "Endless" mode etc.
  • Procedural arena colors and layout for each match
  • AI Superbots can be randomly generated or player designed
  • Supports all OpenXR-compatible headsets and includes a Valve Index Controller option
  • Vignette optional to reduce motion sickness
  • Can create and modify bots both in VR and non-VR mode

PCVR on Windows x64 only. Supports and was developed using the SteamVR runtime. Vulkan required.

Music: Maiden's Capriccio ~ Dream Battle & The Ultimate Round ~ Raccoon Uniforms
